title: You couldn’t make this up. No you couldn’t. No. Really. You could not.
post: Notice there’s no instructions on tuning in to the future. Ain’t that always the case? I’m trying to tune the blasted thing in to show me next week’s Powerball numbers and I just can’t get it to work!
author: Chris
